summary:
Marita van de Laar, MSc, PhD has always been an epidemiologist at heart - with special focus on the prevention and control of infectious diseases. Throughout 25 years as scientist and programme manager at national and internal levels, Marita has gained a unique senior expertise and experience within the areas of public health policy and programmes. Marita was ECDC Head of Programme, creating and maintaining the expert networks on HIV/AIDS, STI and viral hepatitis across the EU. 

Marita has started her own company offering consultancy services to national and international organisations in the field of public health and programme management. Marita has excellent networking and project managing skills. In recent projects, she has been working on the prevention and control of antimicrobial resistance (AMR) in an international context. Recently Marita decided to take an early retirement.
